column4: hey im trying to restore a backup from split files i use this command  sudo cat part.tar.gz* | tar xzvf-                         what am i missing i get error  sudo cat part.tar.gz* | tar xzvf-
it's becuase your using the wrong commands
no cat will show you the binary stuff of the tar.gz
you don't tar should have a extract one tar file and the rest should follow or you will have to extract each one seperately
